text: keferi‘onimi bētesebochi ānidi iminetuni yemīdebik’i mi’imeni sewi āle፡- «sewiyewini kegētachihu bete‘amiratochi be’irigit’i yemet’alechihu sīẖoni ‹gētayē ālahi newi› silemīli tigedilalachihuni? wishetamimi bīẖoni wishetu berisuwi layi newi፡፡ iwinetenya bīẖoni gini yezīya yemīyaseferarachihu kefīlu yagenyachiḫwali፡፡ ālahi yanini irisu diniberi ālafī wishetami yeẖonewini āyimeramina፡፡
